item.description:
UPDATE: The weather is going to beeeeeeeeeautiful on Sunday.  Weatherman is predicting a nice breezy upper 70s day in Boston! Awesome! Makes for a great way to end the weekend. :) HOPE TO SEE YOU THERE!

Join us again for some patio action at Battery Park Bar & Lounge in the Financial District of Boston.  We got a good group going in July and it was fun times! Battery Park is welcoming MeetUp back with an outside bartender, games, cornhole, door prizes and a yet to be named beer/liquor sponsor. DJs Doze and Frank White will be spinning old skool hip hop, R&B and reggae.

Also, their Sunday brunch goes until 3pm and includes a "Make Your Own" Bloody Mary bar. ;)

Battery Park is welcoming us with open arms. We'll be doing door prize giveaways!   BP is offering $4 Twisted Tea, PBR and Naraganssett.

 

NOTE: This event is cross-listed with 4 other MeetUp groups. Let's take over the patio AGAIN!

 

Battery Park is conveniently located in the Financial District of Boston.  It is close to State Street (Orange and Blue Lines), Downtown Crossing (Orange and Red Lines), and a short walk from Gov't Center or Park Street (Green Line).  Everyone is responsible for their own food and drink. PLEASE MAINTAIN A SEPARATE TAB OR PAY AS YOU GO.  Thanks!
item.how_to_find_us: Will be on patio. I look like my picture, or just ask the hostess who I am.
item.name: "Back to the Patio" at Battery Park, Sunday, August 19th
